data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Barnala, Punjab, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Barnala, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Barnala, Punjab, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
God, we pray both the men and women of Barnala, Punjab, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, give the disciples of the the county of Barnala an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jat Gil (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jat Gil (Hindu traditions) people know you.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Barnala, Punjab, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 6,551 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Barnala. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

location.name: Barnala
location.people_groups_list: Jat Dhillon (Sikh traditions), Jat Ghatwal (Hindu traditions), Jat Dosanj, Brahmin Pushkarna, Gagra
